title: Reconnect loop
body:
Monday night when I got home I went to play a game. Got through champ select and everything was fine and as soon as the champ select window closed to transition in game the reconnect button came up and the in-game window never opened.

Despite the numerous attempts of reconnecting, running in client repair, and allowing league through my firewall I have been unable to get into a game and have been stuck in this reconnect loop. Please help!!

replies.body: It was a great idea to add those exceptions for League into your firewall, but I'm wondering if it's still blocking League's access somehow =\ . Try disabling it completely, and as always give the steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) a quick shot to cover the rest of your bases just in case something in there might help.
